channel.title: Server offline?
channel.description: Hi guys, I need help. Other people can't log into my server, it says server is offline. But when i run it, it says server is successfully online and running. Help please !

item.title: Server offline?
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:8, topic:238535”][quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=314804.msg2503077#msg2503077 date=1224794267]

yea, and i didnt portforward, im running my server with u torrent

Run it the original way, uTorrent sucks.

hey now… i use utorrent and no lag… no nothin… lol and i can hold a shit load of ppl wit no lag…
[/quote]

Well its alright, But i prefer the original way, To be honest
I never used uTorrent so i was being a bit Judgemental ;)[/quote]

you think? lol… and yea it doesnt lag as much and its so much easier…

Read full topic

item.title: Server offline?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Portforward, Allow the port through the firewall,
Download no-ip.duc.

For you alone to connect use either;

0.0.0.0
Localhost

Anyone of those is fine.

Read full topic
